repos_url.name: seafloorexplorer
repos_url.description: The front end for Seafloor Explorer

repos_url.name: redis
repos_url.description: Redis is an in-memory database that persists on disk. The data model is key-value, but many different kind of values are supported: Strings, Lists, Sets, Sorted Sets, Hashes

repos_url.name: Galaxy-Zoo-Authors
repos_url.description: Epic list of volunteer names for GZ

repos_url.name: planet-four
repos_url.description: Identify and measure features on the surface of Mars

repos_url.name: t7e
repos_url.description: In-DOM translation library for old Zooniverse projects

repos_url.name: api-example
repos_url.description: [DEPRECATED] An example app using the zooniverse Api

Remove `inject` from single image viewer (#3132)

Remove a stray import that was left over in `SingleImageViewer`.

remove mentions of `@inject` from FeedbackModal (#3134)

`FeedbackModal` was refactored as a functional component in #2881, but the old class component was still mentioned in the test comments.

Classifier: Wrap text modifiers in a fieldset (#3020)

Wrap the text tasks's modifier buttons in a fieldset, with legend.

Maintenance Week: QuickTalk tests (#3048)

* QuickTalk tests - replace wrapper with screen

* QuickTalk - update tests to use userEvent

* QuickTalkContainer - add very basic tests

* Remove describe.only

* Add tests for Comments

* Add tests for PostForm

* Add tests for UserAvatar

* Add tests for UserRole

* Change QuickTalk tests to not use Test IDs as much

* Add role to Quick Talk Panel

* Remove describe.only

* Fix QuickTalkContainer specs

* Change all QuickTalk alt text and aria labels into translated strings

fix svg height rendering including in webkit browsers (safari) (#3139)

combining height and width 100% causes webkit to incorrectly calculate the height but removing the width setting allows height to work correctly

related issue https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7570917/svg-height-incorrectly-calculated-in-webkit-browsers/12631326

Classifier: Override mocha timeout for TaskAreaConnector (#3140)

The task area connector tests have been timing out and blocking CI. This overrides the Mocha timeout for those tests.

lib-react-components: Refactor storybook and spec files for SpacedHeading + SpacedText (#3049)

* refactor SpacedHeading to use 'controls'

* refactor SpacedText story to use 'controls'

* use storybook/testing-react in SpacedHeading spec file

* refactor SpacedText spec file

* update components with Docgen

* use getByRole in SpacedHeading spec

* white space

* fix SpacedText propType

* destructure SpacedHeading props

Co-authored-by: Jim O'Donnell <jim@zooniverse.org>

* destructure SpacedText props

Co-authored-by: Jim O'Donnell <jim@zooniverse.org>

* clean up

* add name to SpacedHeading query spec

Co-authored-by: Jim O'Donnell <jim@zooniverse.org>

* remove "Defaults to" from docgen

Co-authored-by: Jim O'Donnell <jim@zooniverse.org>

lib-react-components: Refactor PlainButton (#3053)

* refactor PlainButton stories

* refactor PlainButton specs

* add back React imports

* fix yarn.lock trim version

* declare full href in PlainButton story

Co-authored-by: Jim O'Donnell <jim@zooniverse.org>

* declare defaultColor constant in PlainButton

* destructure props in PlainButton

* remove "Defaults to" from docgen comments

* add extra checks for link or button in specs

Co-authored-by: Jim O'Donnell <jim@zooniverse.org>

Refactor page data-fetching
- `fetchProjectPage` will fetch a project page with translated content.
- `fetchTranslations` can take an optional fallback argument.

You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.title: Bump @storybook/addon-storysource from 6.4.21 to 6.5.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

issue.body:
Bumps [@storybook/addon-storysource](https://github.com/storybookjs/storybook/tree/HEAD/addons/storysource) from 6.4.21 to 6.5.0.
Release notes

Sourced from @​storybook/addon-storysource's releases.

v6.5.0

Storybook 6.5 is here!! 🎉🎉🎉

SB6.5 adds new testing and design review workflows while improving core performance and compatibility.

  • 🤖 Interaction testing simulate interactions and run assertions in the browser
  • 🎨 Figma plugin to connect stories to variants
  • 🏎️ Webpack 5 lazy compilation for faster start up
  • ⚡ Vite builder for near instant rebuilds
  • 💯 Hundreds more fixes and quality of life improvements

More info in the Github issue Storybook 6.5 Release 👟. Release announcement coming soon!!!

v6.5.0-rc.1

Bug Fixes

  • CLI: Improve webpack version and add detection of nextjs (#18220)
  • ArgsTable: Gracefully handle conditional args failures (#18248)
  • Controls: Fix reset button broken for !undefined URL values (#18231)
  • Vue3: Add support for TSX in single file components (#18038)

v6.5.0-rc.0

Features

  • Addon-a11y: Show % of users in toolbar menu (#18003)

Bug Fixes

  • Web-components: Clean Lit Expression comments in story source (#18108)
  • Vue: Map args correctly in CSF3 implicit render function (#18209)
  • Vue3: Fix CSF3 implicit render function when storyStoreV7 is enabled (#18208

Maintenance

  • CLI: Don't throw is Ctrl + C was pressed when selecting a package in the build command (#18195)
  • Build: Cleanup noise from unit tests (#18196)

Dependency Upgrades

  • Fixed PnP compatibility for bundled components package (#18015)

v6.5.0-beta.8

Bug Fixes

  • Composition: Fix metadata.json incorrectly overriding main.js refs versions (#18185)

Maintenance

  • Examples: Set channelOptions to disallow function serialization (#18071)

... (truncated)

Changelog

Sourced from @​storybook/addon-storysource's changelog.

6.5.0-rc.1 (May 18, 2022)

Bug Fixes

  • CLI: Improve webpack version and add detection of nextjs (#18220)
  • ArgsTable: Gracefully handle conditional args failures (#18248)
  • Controls: Fix reset button broken for !undefined URL values (#18231)
  • Vue3: Add support for TSX in single file components (#18038)

6.5.0-rc.0 (May 17, 2022)

Features

  • Addon-a11y: Show % of users in toolbar menu (#18003)

Bug Fixes

  • Web-components: Clean Lit Expression comments in story source (#18108)
  • Vue: Map args correctly in CSF3 implicit render function (#18209)
  • Vue3: Fix CSF3 implicit render function when storyStoreV7 is enabled (#18208

Maintenance

  • CLI: Don't throw is Ctrl + C was pressed when selecting a package in the build command (#18195)
  • Build: Cleanup noise from unit tests (#18196)

Dependency Upgrades

  • Fixed PnP compatibility for bundled components package (#18015)

6.5.0-beta.8 (May 11, 2022)

Bug Fixes

  • Composition: Fix metadata.json incorrectly overriding main.js refs versions (#18185)

Maintenance

  • Examples: Set channelOptions to disallow function serialization (#18071)

Dependency Upgrades

  • Upgrade to telejson 6 (#18164)

6.5.0-beta.7 (May 9, 2022)

Features

  • CSF3: Add title prefix support for stories with custom titles (#17724)

... (truncated)

Commits
  • 05070ca v6.5.0
  • 9e1f519 Update git head to 6.5.0-rc.1, update yarn.lock
  • 3f09d4e v6.5.0-rc.1
  • 6cc69b5 Update git head to 6.5.0-rc.0, update yarn.lock
  • c27fd9e v6.5.0-rc.0
  • 6ecbdd8 Update git head to 6.5.0-beta.8, update yarn.lock
  • 9b9d570 v6.5.0-beta.8
  • 337c11b Update git head to 6.5.0-beta.7, update yarn.lock
  • 14bb6d2 v6.5.0-beta.7
  • f4909f8 Update git head to 6.5.0-beta.6, update yarn.lock
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=@storybook/addon-storysource&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=6.4.21&new-version=6.5.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.body:
Bumps [@storybook/builder-webpack5](https://github.com/storybookjs/storybook/tree/HEAD/lib/core) from 6.4.21 to 6.5.0.
Release notes

Sourced from @​storybook/builder-webpack5's releases.

v6.5.0

Storybook 6.5 is here!! 🎉🎉🎉

SB6.5 adds new testing and design review workflows while improving core performance and compatibility.

  • 🤖 Interaction testing simulate interactions and run assertions in the browser
  • 🎨 Figma plugin to connect stories to variants
  • 🏎️ Webpack 5 lazy compilation for faster start up
  • ⚡ Vite builder for near instant rebuilds
  • 💯 Hundreds more fixes and quality of life improvements

More info in the Github issue Storybook 6.5 Release 👟. Release announcement coming soon!!!

v6.5.0-rc.1

Bug Fixes

  • CLI: Improve webpack version and add detection of nextjs (#18220)
  • ArgsTable: Gracefully handle conditional args failures (#18248)
  • Controls: Fix reset button broken for !undefined URL values (#18231)
  • Vue3: Add support for TSX in single file components (#18038)

v6.5.0-rc.0

Features

  • Addon-a11y: Show % of users in toolbar menu (#18003)

Bug Fixes

  • Web-components: Clean Lit Expression comments in story source (#18108)
  • Vue: Map args correctly in CSF3 implicit render function (#18209)
  • Vue3: Fix CSF3 implicit render function when storyStoreV7 is enabled (#18208

Maintenance

  • CLI: Don't throw is Ctrl + C was pressed when selecting a package in the build command (#18195)
  • Build: Cleanup noise from unit tests (#18196)

Dependency Upgrades

  • Fixed PnP compatibility for bundled components package (#18015)

v6.5.0-beta.8

Bug Fixes

  • Composition: Fix metadata.json incorrectly overriding main.js refs versions (#18185)

Maintenance

  • Examples: Set channelOptions to disallow function serialization (#18071)

... (truncated)

Changelog

Sourced from @​storybook/builder-webpack5's changelog.

6.5.0-rc.1 (May 18, 2022)

Bug Fixes

  • CLI: Improve webpack version and add detection of nextjs (#18220)
  • ArgsTable: Gracefully handle conditional args failures (#18248)
  • Controls: Fix reset button broken for !undefined URL values (#18231)
  • Vue3: Add support for TSX in single file components (#18038)

6.5.0-rc.0 (May 17, 2022)

Features

  • Addon-a11y: Show % of users in toolbar menu (#18003)

  • Web-components: Clean Lit Expression comments in story source (#18108)
  • Vue: Map args correctly in CSF3 implicit render function (#18209)
  • Vue3: Fix CSF3 implicit render function when storyStoreV7 is enabled (#18208

Maintenance

  • CLI: Don't throw is Ctrl + C was pressed when selecting a package in the build command (#18195)
  • Build: Cleanup noise from unit tests (#18196)

Dependency Upgrades

  • Fixed PnP compatibility for bundled components package (#18015)

6.5.0-beta.8 (May 11, 2022)

Bug Fixes

  • Composition: Fix metadata.json incorrectly overriding main.js refs versions (#18185)

Maintenance

  • Examples: Set channelOptions to disallow function serialization (#18071)

Dependency Upgrades

  • Upgrade to telejson 6 (#18164)

6.5.0-beta.7 (May 9, 2022)

Features

  • CSF3: Add title prefix support for stories with custom titles (#17724)

... (truncated)

  • Build: Cleanup noise from unit tests (#18196)

Dependency Upgrades

  • Fixed PnP compatibility for bundled components package (#18015)

6.5.0-beta.8 (May 11, 2022)

Bug Fixes

  • Composition: Fix metadata.json incorrectly overriding main.js refs versions (#18185)

Maintenance

  • Examples: Set channelOptions to disallow function serialization (#18071)

Dependency Upgrades

  • Upgrade to telejson 6 (#18164)

6.5.0-beta.7 (May 9, 2022)

Features

  • CSF3: Add title prefix support for stories with custom titles (#17724)

pull_request.title: improve reducer UI form behaviours
pull_request.body:
This PR adds the `empty_extracts` filter to the UI form - this will allow the reducer to include or ignore extracts with empty data payloads created when the classification annotations don't have the task key.

Also this PR fixes the existing filter form behaviour to ensure that all existing filter inputs are preserved, displayed properly and available for form re-submission to avoid clobbering this field on update action.

repo.name: caesar
repo.description: Backend automation and orchestration

repo.name: caesar
repo.description: Backend automation and orchestration

commits.message:
Refactor About page navigation
Remove redundant page content from page props. Only send back titles for pages that have content.
Set default strings for all project pages
Fix AboutPage tests

comment.body: I'd forgotten to change `page?.content` to `page?.strings?.content`. Should be fixed now.

pull_request.title: Project app: Localise project and project_pages
pull_request.body:
Hook up `app_project` to the Panoptes `/translations` API for both the project and project page content. Workflows are already localised.
- Project translations are fetched after the project loads.
- Translated project fields are replaced by views, which are aliases for the corresponding translation strings.
- Project page translations are fetched in the page controller for each page, with the strings being added to each page as `page.strings`.
- `page.strings` is used to display the title and content of each page.

## Package
app-project

## Linked Issue and/or Talk Post

## How to Review
I've mocked a French and a Spanish locale for testing, so you should be able to browse translations, from Panoptes, for PH-TESS by adding the language code to the URL:
https://local.zooniverse.org:3000/projects/es/nora-dot-eisner/planet-hunters-tess?env=production
https://local.zooniverse.org:3000/projects/fr/nora-dot-eisner/planet-hunters-tess?env=production

# Checklist
_PR Creator - Please cater the checklist to fit the review needed for your code changes._
_PR Reviewer - Use the checklist during your review. Each point should be checkmarked or discussed before PR approval._

## General
- [ ] Tests are passing locally and on Github
- [ ] Documentation is up to date and changelog has been updated if appropriate
- [ ] You can `yarn panic && yarn bootstrap` or `docker-compose up --build` and FEM works as expected
- [ ] FEM works in all major desktop browsers: Firefox, Chrome, Edge, Safari (Use Browserstack account as needed)
- [ ] FEM works in a mobile browser

## General UX
Example Staging Project: [i-fancy-cats](https://local.zooniverse.org:3000/projects/brooke/i-fancy-cats)
- [ ] All pages of a FEM project load: Home Page, Classify Page, and About Pages
- [ ] Can submit a classification
- [ ] Can sign-in and sign-out
- [ ] The component is accessible
  - Can be used with a screen reader [BBC guide to VoiceOver](https://bbc.github.io/accessibility-news-and-you/accessibility-and-testing-with-voiceover-os.html)
  - Can be used from the keyboard [WebAIM guide to keyboard testing](https://webaim.org/techniques/keyboard/#testing)
  - It is passing accessibility checks in the storybook

## New Feature
- [ ] The PR creator has listed user actions to use when testing the new feature
- [ ] Unit tests are included for the new feature
- [ ] A storybook story has been created or updated
  - Example of SlideTutorial [component](https://github.com/zooniverse/front-end-monorepo/blob/master/packages/lib-classifier/src/components/Classifier/components/SlideTutorial/SlideTutorial.js) with docgen comments, and its [story](https://zooniverse.github.io/front-end-monorepo/@zooniverse/classifier/index.html?path=/docs/other-slidetutorial--default)
